text:
- mod_fcgid 2.3.4 from actual FreeBSD Ports
- httpd apache-2.2.14
- php5-5.2.12

I testet two apps, roundcube and phpBB.
When uploading files (webmail attachment for example) to the server by HTML form, those files are corrupt (broken images, different MD5 checksums).

Switch back to mod_fcgid 2.2 solves this issue.
creator: eric@krausser-edv.de

text:
This is most likely an issue which is already fixed in svn.

A tarball with that and other recent fixes is at

http://httpd.apache.org/dev/dist/mod_fcgid/

That is a UNRELEASED TEST version of mod_fcgid that might be formally released if testing completes successfully.

Alternatively, apply the changes at

http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=revision&revision=826829

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 48021 ***
creator: trawick@apache.org
